column4: DIN-5 Cable with all pins connected
DIN-5 Cable with all pins connected
DSUB-9 Male Horizontal P2.77x2.84mm EdgePinOffset7.70mm MountingHolesOffset9.12mm
Slide switch Single Pole Double Throw (SPDT) P2.54mm
W65C02S (can be replaced with a R65C02)
W65C22S (can be replaced with a regular 6522. Sound volume will be lower though)
28C256 (can be replaced with a 27128 but pin1 needs to be unconnected (lift it from the socket))
6551 (cannot be replaced with a W65C51 as some hardware bugs will prevent it to work with a minitel)
Mini DC-DC step-down converter (might be replaced with a 7805 regulator, not tested)
